name: Private Ryan
description:
You're in the Omaha Beach with your fellows and you have to rescue Ryan. But this is not be so much easy.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Arrow Keys to moviment.

Left Button Mouse to Shot.

Right Button Mouse to turn sniper(only when you close to the ditch). 

G to use Grenade. 

SHIFT to mode Stealth(only when you into the Bunker).

CREDITS:

ART:  GabrielModog (Me)

CODE: André Gustavo (https://marmitex.itch.io/)

ENGINE: Game Maker: Studio 2

Some bug can be apear, but don't worries!

If you find some bugs, report to us! Thanks to play it!
